sourcesContent:
<template >
    <template v-if="(productsList.length > 0) && (!isPostLoading)">
        <catalog-item
        v-for = "product in productsList"
        :productData="product"
        :key="product.article"
        />
    </template>
    <template v-if="productsList.length = 0" class='text-center col-9 mt-5'>
        Нет товаров удовлетворяющих вашему запросу
    </template>
    <template v-else>
        <svg class="spinner" viewBox="0 0 50 50">
                <circle class="path" cx="25" cy="25" r="20" fill="none" stroke-width="5"></circle>
            </svg>
    </template>
    

</template>

<script>
export default {
    props: {
        productsList: {
            type: Object,
            default() {
                return {};
            },

        }
    },

    data() {
        return {
            isProductLoading: Boolean

        }    
    }
}

</script>

<style scoped>
.spinner {
        animation: rotate 2s linear infinite;
        z-index: 2;
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        margin: -25px 0 0 -25px;
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
    }
  
  .spinner .path {
    stroke: hsl(210, 90%, 24%);
    stroke-linecap: round;
    animation: dash 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
  }
  

@keyframes rotate {
  100% {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@keyframes dash {
  0% {
    stroke-dasharray: 1, 150;
    stroke-dashoffset: 0;
  }
  50% {
    stroke-dasharray: 90, 150;
    stroke-dashoffset: -35;
  }
  100% {
    stroke-dasharray: 90, 150;
    stroke-dashoffset: -124;
  }
}

</style>
